description: Update read cursor and mark messages as read (consolidates cursor update + read receipts)

main.description: Update the read cursor for a conversation and optionally mark messages as read. Supports both cursor-based tracking (by sequence position) and explicit message-based tracking (by message ID).

cursor.description: Opaque cursor value representing the read position (e.g., seq number as string)

messageId.description: Specific message ID to mark as read (alternative to cursor-based tracking)

markRead.description: If true, generates a read receipt event visible to other members. Default false (silent cursor update).

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the cursor was updated

readAt.description: Timestamp of the read receipt (only present when markRead is true)

errors.name: NotMember
errors.description: Caller is not a member of the conversation

errors.name: InvalidCursor
errors.description: The provided cursor value is invalid
